thread.title: Watch How Turnt Up Shawn Elliott Is To Be the New South Carolina New Head Coach
thread.title_full: Watch How Turnt Up Shawn Elliott Is To Be the New South Carolina New Head Coach | Complex UK

author: Dana Scott
title: Watch How Turnt Up Shawn Elliott Is To Be the New South Carolina New Head Coach
text:
We all have that feeling of relief and motivation to excel once we get the call for a new job or promotion. After replacing the newly retired Steve Spurrier as the head coach of the University of South Carolina football squad, Shawn Elliot wanted his team and the Gamecock faithful about how elated and motivated he is to deliver after getting the nod.
Above is just one way of showing his team that he can turn up with the best of them, smacking his player's helmets and throwing haymakers like a Bushwacker out the tunnel to gain their trust and aggression on the field. But his spaz-out didn't stop there. Here's another shot of him acting a fool:
You only get one chance to make a first impression.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
[ via TheBigLead ]
